data.actual_result: On iOS, it displays a USA, China, and Korea flag on a single line.
data.expected_result: You should see small block emojis for U,S,C,N,K,R with each on separate lines.
data.short_description: Regional indicator emoji turns into country flags in a multi-line message
data.steps_to_repro: - Type a new message (preferably on PC) by doing the following: - Enter "🇺 " (must have 2+ spaces after the last colon) - Line break with SHIFT+ENTER - Enter "🇸 " (2+ spaces after it) - Line break - Enter "🇨 " (2+ spaces after it) - Line break - Enter "🇳 " (2+ spaces after it) - Line break - Enter "🇰 " (2+ spaces after it) - Line break - Enter "🇷 " (2+ spaces after it) - Line break - Send the message - View it on an iOS device
